channel.title: Web on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Memo Tut

item.title: Prepare a pseudo API server using GitHub Actions
item.description: ## Introduction Perhaps recently, a feature called GitHub Actions has been added. This is the one that can fire certain Actions (shell script executions) for certain events. For example, it is a function for so-called CI/CD that builds when PR of dev branch is merged and pushes it to dev-pages branch. At this time, I participated in the COVID-19 countermeasure site Hokkaido version, which is currently a big move, and developed using this function.

item.title: A network diagram was created with COVID-19 data.
item.description: ## Introduction Create a graph, network diagram, and data table based on the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare COVID-19 infection status data and create a Web application. Did. The created app will be the one with the link below. App link: https://chomoku.herokuapp.com/covid-19 Below is the screen of the network diagram. < /a> The data used is obtained from the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare website. Scraping is just using the pandas read_html function.

item.title: Python newbie tried Hello World in 30 seconds using micro framework Flask
item.description: ## What is Flask Python micro web framework Minimal functionality provided as standard Django for full stack framework Reference -Comparison of 4 types of Python Web framework about me Python history 3 days Reason for doing looks fun What I did ** ① Flask installation ** pip install Flask ** ② Make hello.py in your favorite folder ** ③ Paste the following from flask import Flask app = Flask(__name__) @app.
